meta.title: Zeitgeist
meta.description: Zeitgeist is a decentralized network for creating, betting on, and resolving prediction markets. The platform's native currency, the ZTG, is used to sway the direction of the network, and as a means of last-call dispute resolution.

title: Zeitgeist
description: Zeitgeist is a decentralized network for creating, betting on, and resolving prediction markets. The platform's native currency, the ZTG, is used to sway the direction of the network, and as a means of last-call dispute resolution.
